Posts.Content: Thanks Debra for all your information, I know where you are coming from it is so necessary to continue with ant-sickness before it it overwhelms you. Just started Chemo on 11th April , so just taking each day as it comes. Been suffering from headaches and naseau and facial pain, and have been pretty tired.Constipation has been one of my problems since surgery in February ,have tried a few concoctions,including prune juice I know its not everybodys choice, lactoluse and movicol sachets. Sandra
Posts.Title: starting chemotherapy........

Posts.Content: Hi All, As a newbe to this chemotheraphy, starting first session Wed 11th April, I know it wont be easy, but it has to be done. Treatment will be 5fu. Does anyone else have any tips to make  this journey easier. lucygirl xx
